name: Puzzzle EXPERIMENTAL MODE
description:
This is an experimental version of Puzzzle, a soon-to-be trashy Steam release. The reason for doing this, is so I can add in more experimental features that the community can hold up for review before adding in / not adding in to the finished product.

e-mail me to notify me of bugs and or features you don't want in the finished game or stuff you do want in the finished game: alvincrossand@gmail.com
